name: 48 Hours in Doha
description:
Here's something a little different for this channel. On a recent trip with Qatar the airline asked me to stop over in Doha for a couple of days to check out their stopover program.  

Yes I fully disclose that Discover Qatar paid for my hotel and touring.  But then I'm in the industry and need to know what Doha is like as a stopover destination.  In summary I was impressed and would like to go back and see the things I missed - like the museums and travelling further afield.  

I hope you like this video. 

Happy Travelling

Dennis

ps - normal flight reviews will be coming soon.  Next up is Thai Airways 747 First Class - that was one amazing flight!
